thread.section_title: Allen School of Health Sciences Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Allen School of Health Sciences | allenschool.edu
thread.title: Janis
thread.title_full: Allen School of Health Sciences reviewed by Janis

author: Janis
title: Janis
text: The knowledge learned far surpasses what I had expected from an online school. As a nurse for many years my understanding was far from great on the billing and coding side. My use of ICD-10 codes was only in preparing a lab request. Know I know how to abstract the information from the medical record plus how it is needed for proper billing and revenue.
